This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. Learn more

  • Required to run the website
  • Monitoring website usage and optimizing the user experience
  • Evaluation of marketing actions
  • Storage of your preferences from previous visits
  • Collecting user feedback to improve our website
  • Recording of your interests in order to provide customised content and offers
  1. Monetize
  2. Personalization

Stealth Marketing

According to recent research, 80 percent of consumers are more likely to do business with a company that offers a personalized experience. As brands and consumers alike increasingly embrace personalization, one-to-one marketing that engages individual consumers based on their unique interests and preferences is on the rise.
Carsen’s Stealth Marketing delivers enterprise-grade personalization and campaign management operations in accordance with your strategic plans and customer lifetime value management (CLVM) ambitions.
Having full transparency, accountability and control over the entire process allows our clients to have peace of mind when establishing such a complex personalization operations. Delivered at no cost to you, a risk-free implementation of new revenue streams emphasizes Carsen’s commitment to creating value for your business.
Benefits of Stealth Marketing services:

Risk-free value creation

Full insights into campaign effectiveness

Full control over critical stages of stealth marketing campaigns

Privacy by Design and Default are built in the service

Designated Data Protection Officer will ensure full compliance with the applicable privacy laws
